author: abdoulline
body:
#### PR description:

Included is a variaiton of light propagation time in (the same) fibers for p.e.'s from different locations.
Previous version mistakenly omitted this component (making light propagation time identical for differently located p.e.'s)      

#### PR validation:
runTheMatrix.py -l limited 

private 2021 particle-gun test wrt 12_0_0_pre4 (old HF ShowerLibrary) shows a good agreement after HF timePhase re-tuning (as a part of this PR)
https://cms-cpt-software.web.cern.ch/cms-cpt-software/General/Validation/SVSuite/HCAL/calo_scan_single_pi/12_1_X/12_1_X_2021-08-03-2300+timefixHF_run3_vs_12_0_0_pre4_run3_SinglePi/
